name: dbviewer
description: Viewer application that connects to patent DB

scripts.package: npm run transpile && npm run transpile-main && npm run package-win
scripts.start: npm run transpile && npm run transpile-main && electron .
scripts.insertNew: docker start sqlserver && set USEDB=NextIdea& node ./test/3_insertPatents.js
scripts.updateExisting: docker start sqlserver && set USEDB=NextIdea& node ./test/5_updatePatents.test.js
scripts.getPatents: docker start sqlserver && set USEDB=NextIdea& set DEBUG=nightmare& node ./test/4_getpatents.test.js

author: Bill Farmilo
